original_text: and the charge was two-thirds of a shekel for the plowshares and for the mattocks, and a third of a shekel for sharpening the axes and for setting the goads.
korean_text: 곧 그들이 괭이나 삽이나 쇠스랑이나 도끼나 쇠채찍이 무딜 때에 그리하였으므로

sentences.original_text: and the charge was two-thirds of a shekel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 값은 세겔의 삼분의 이였습니다

sentences.original_text: for the plowshares and for the mattocks
and a third of a shekel
for sharpening the axes and for setting the goads
sentences.korean_translation: 도끼를 가는 것과 채찍을 세우는 것에 대한 것이었습니다
